outline:
1. to grow weak, grow dim, grow faint, falter, be weak, be dim, be darkened, be restrained, be faint, fail
    1. (Qal) to grow dim, grow faint
    2. (Piel) to faint, grow weak, grow faint
kjv_def: darken, be dim, fail, faint, restrain, [idiom] utterly.
strongs_def: to be weak, i.e. (figuratively) to despond (causatively, rebuke), or (of light, the eye) to grow dull
